Room.Name: Hafnia Circle
Room.ShortDescription: You are just south of East Hafnia Boulevard, on Hafnia Circle.
Room.LongDescription: On the west side of the road you see a tree shaded building with a statue standing near the entrance. The steps are wide and there seems to be an open door at the top of the steps. Engraved in the stone are the words, "Fraternal Order of Rangers."
